DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine clinical performance comfilcon A comparison senofilcon C .
DOC.brief_title: Performance Comparison Between Comfilcon A Senofilcon C Lenses
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , multi-center , bilateral , double-masked , randomize , cross-over , daily wear , two month dispense study compare clinical performance comfilcon A senofilcon C lenses one month wear .
DOC.criteria: A person eligible inclusion study he/she : Is 18 34 year age ( inclusive ) Has selfreported eye exam last two year Is spherical soft contact lens wearer Has contact lens spherical prescription 1.00 6.00 ( inclusive ) Has spectacle cylinder great 0.75D ( Diopters ) eye . Can achieve best correct spectacle distance visual acuity 20/25 ( 0.10 logMAR ) good eye . Can achieve distance visual acuity 20/30 ( 0.18 logMAR ) good eye study contact lens . Has clear cornea active ocular disease Has read , understood sign information consent letter . Has contact lens prescription fit within available parameter study lens . Is willing anticipated able comply wear schedule ( least 6 day per week , 12 hours/day assume contraindication ) . Is willing comply visit schedule A person exclude study he/she : Has history achieve comfortable CL ( contact lens ) wear ( defined 6 day per week ; > 10 hours/day ) Presents clinically significant anterior segment abnormality Presents ocular systemic disease need medication might interfere contact lens wear . Presents slit lamp finding would contraindicate contact lens wear : Pathological dry eye associate finding Significant pterygium , pinguecula , corneal scar within visual axis Neovascularization > 0.75 mm limbus Giant papillary conjunctivitis ( GCP ) bad grade 1 Anterior uveitis iritis ( history past year ) Seborrheic eczema eyelid region , Seborrheic conjunctivitis History corneal ulcer fungal infection Poor personal hygiene Has know history corneal hypoesthesia ( reduced corneal sensitivity ) Has aphakia , keratoconus highly irregular cornea . Has presbyopia dependence spectacle near work contact lens . Has undergone corneal refractive surgery . Is participate type eye related clinical research study . Is habitually use rewetting/ lubricate eye drop per day Is currently wear daily disposable lens
